mapper.insert: INSERT INTO News (news_id, title, source_url, source_bc, category, news_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (0, #{title}, #{sourceUrl}, #{sourceBc}, #{category}, #{newsAt}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT news_id AS newsId, source_bc AS sourceBc, source_url AS sourceUrl, cards_path AS cardPath, title, category, created_at AS createdAt, news_at AS newsAt FROM News;
SELECT news_id AS newsId, source_bc AS sourceBc, source_url AS sourceUrl, title, category, created_at AS createdAt, news_at AS newsAt FROM News WHERE news_id = #{newsId};
SELECT news_id AS newsId, video_file_path AS videoFilePath, title, category, created_at AS createdAt FROM News WHERE category = #{category};
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM News WHERE source_url = #{sourceUrl})
